title: Interactive EFL Math Project-Based Learning Utilizing Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Project-Based Assessment Utilizing ClassPoint Tools in a Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain 20 English math terms with accurate pronunciation through the ClassPoint app
Learners can create a 3-minute video explaining math problem-solving processes in English through group projects
Learners can submit self-evaluations in English based on weekly learning records

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
